text: I have a question about ARM mac binaries. I see that Rmath_jl is now built after <https://github.com/JuliaPackaging/Yggdrasil/pull/2732>, which looks pretty simple. Would it be useful to make other such PRs for various other packages, which simply wrap one library?

, which looks pretty simple. Would it be useful to make other such PRs for various other packages, which simply wrap one library?

text: And, is there a local testing stage which should be done, or will CI of some sort tell me if I mess it up? Have never done anything with BinaryBuilder.
